document_data.mainbody:
Quellena was a warlock looter who operated on the Sword Coast during the late 15 century DR. For a time, she worked for the gnome crew leader Gimblebock.
She had light brown hair and an intricate pattern of tattoos that adorned her face and neck.
The warlock fought with a quarterstaff and utilized a variety of arcane spells.
Quellena was a target of romantic affections from a person named Alys. She carried a note from the admirer on her person during the time she worked with Gimblebock.
In the , Quelenna and the other looters were trying to find their way into an ancinet crypt. Quelenna took the high ground during her guard duties, looking over the crypts main entrances.
